item.title: Training attack and strength on coffins in the dt pyramid
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Roffles Teh Roffles
item.description:
@Teh_Roffles wrote:

ok i made the door use defence, which was fine then i tried the coffin for str and attack

This is the strength case

case 6512: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You gain Strength XP"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(1658); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[18]), 18); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

But it doesnt work, nothing happens when i click on it, help please?

Read full topic
